Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2011 04:43PM DMD wrote: Nancy, I had taxotere and am a little over 9 weeks from my last chemo and I have about 3/4's of an inch of even growth all over and it looks like the same color with as before. Don't worry sweetie!
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2011 09:29AM DMD wrote: Kittycat, I also think you look great in both but I vote for the brunette...love the color on you.  I don't think I have posted on this thread yet but am checking in now because I am 9 weeks post chemo (taxotere and cytoxan) and I only have 3/4's of an inch of hair growth.  I am getting impatient and sick of the wig. My hair is naturally stawberry blonde and I decided to have some fun and get a darker auburn wig but regret that decision because it feels too strange. So I can't wait to get rid of it.  I am using more scarves now but looking forward to the day I can ditch it all.  My hair was also looking like it lacked any color at first but now I see more and more color...along with some grey though. I have never dyed my hair before does anyone know how long we should wait before we do this? I don't know if the chemo affects the way hair absorbs color? Thanks, Dawn
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Feb 4, 2011 09:29AM DMD wrote: Oh Diane...I am wishing you the best of luck on your date tonight!  I know what you mean about not feeling sexy...it is hard to when our appearance has changed so much. I really believe though that a confident woman is a sexy woman...you are still the same person he knows and likes but you are now even stronger for all you have gone through.  Share what you want about your story...because it is such an important part of our lives but don't spend the night talking about it...you know men love to talk about themselves...haha! Relax and enjoy, I am sure it will all go well!!!

Posts.Content: Jan 27, 2011 06:06PM DMD wrote: I am 66 days post TC and I have barely an inch...I check it a lot too. I started with that clear stubble as well and it is slowly changing to my natural hair color.  Unfortunately, I just lost my eyebrows and eyelashes this last month...what the heck?  I kept them throughout my chemo, why are they gone now? The eyebrows are already starting to come back in but nothing at all on the eyelashes.  Seems strange!

Suggestions?
